text: Kalamasseriyil Kalyanayogam is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Balu Kiriyath, starring Mukesh and Charmila in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Mukesh as Balachandran * Kalpana as Chembakassery Shakuntala * Premkumar as Prakashan * Charmila as Ashwathy Nair * Indrans as Palarivattom Philippose * Janardanan as Kalamassery Krishnan nair * Rajan P Dev as Edappally Raman Nair * Narendra Prasad as KodalipparampilSankara Menon *Kanakalatha as Soudamini *K. R. Vatsala as Ambika *Zainuddin as Gundu Vasu *Satheesh as Chembakassery Chandrappan *Rizabawa as Edappally Anantharaman *KTS Padannayil *Kalabhavan Navas as Navas *Shaju *Kalabhavan Haneef *Nikhil *Bindu Varapuzha as Mariyamma *Usha TT as Hostelwarden Annakutty *Ragini as Mrs Thara Umesh *Rani Larius as Balachandran's sister ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Kalamasseriyil Kalyanayogam
